info.name: jupyter-bridge
info.summary: Enhances JupyterLab by adding customizable footer buttons to code cells for improved interactivity and visibility control, supporting operations like running cells, hiding/showing code, and managing output directly from the cell interface.

info.name: jupyter-bridge
info.summary: A JupyterLab extension that adds footer buttons to code cells for improved interactivity and visibility control, supporting operations like running cells, hiding/showing code, and managing output directly from the cell interface. Initial functionality included to mark documentation cells that are controlled by their corresponding code cells.
